summary: Creative, care about good food, always looking for adventure, is being able to work well under pressure with knowledge of and experience in Food & Beverage brand and concept development, strategy and placemaking.

awards.title: FD Gazellen Award 2014
awards.description: FD Gazellen Award 2014, het Financieele Dagblad organiseert de FD Gazellen Awards voor de snelst groeiende bedrijven van Nederland. Iedere onderneming die de afgelopen drie jaar een omzetgroei van ten minste 20% wist te behalen, komt in aanmerking.

projects.title: de Efteling, Danse Macabre theme park area F&B concept development
projects.description:
Danse Macabre is the part of a new themed area which is currently under construction, this will be the new place of the famous music symfony, dancing with death, a thrilled attraction with also shops and Food & Beverage. 

Target opening in 2024

contributors.headline: Food & Beverage concept strategist | Partner Conceptional | Creative Director | Support Fuku Ramen

projects.title: Alamar Foods Company, F&B concept development of Domino's MENA and Dunkin' North Africa
projects.description:
Alamar Foods is a master franchise operator for Domino’s (450 stores) in the MENAP (Middle East, North Africa and Pakistan) region and Dunkin'​ (29 store) in Egypt and North Africa. Together with Alamar's team we're working on a redesign of the stores for Domino's and Dunkin', design & develop up a Flagship store of Dunkin'. Alamar has a solid position in the MENAP QSR- industry and rapidly expanding & diversified Food & Beverage group. 

Food truck and food container for Domino's pizza.

contributors.headline: Food & Beverage concept strategist | Partner Conceptional | Creative Director | Support Fuku Ramen

projects.title: de Efteling, Grand Hotel F&B concept development
projects.description:
Efteling Grand Hotel is the first and bespoke hotel accommodation within the theme park. Besides this, it is the biggest one with 7 floors, 143 rooms with over 700 rooms, 2 restaurants and many more facilities. The restaurants & bars are open for park guests as well and offer immersive hospitality experience.

Target opening in 2024

contributors.headline: Food & Beverage concept strategist | Partner Conceptional | Creative Director | Support Fuku Ramen

projects.title: Nordsee GmbH, F&B concept development of GO!FISH and Next Gen store
projects.description:
Nordsee operates over 370 restaurants (franchise partners and company owned stores) in Europe, mostly located in populated areas such as city centers, airports and train stations. Nordsee’s knowledge about fish has been passed on from generation to generation. Together with Nordsee team we developed GO!FISH, the rebellious younger sister of Nordsee. Our mission is to spread all of this knowledge and passion for fish to the new generations of fish lovers, with GO!FISH.

Nordsee concept- and menu development
Next Generation store development

projects.title: CitizenM, Food & Beverage concept development & roll out
projects.description: CitizenM (13) started with an idea to disrupt the traditional hotel industry by creating a luxury hybrid hotel for today’s modern travellers – eliminating the frustrations these travellers shared. A new breed of hotel designed around a new type of traveller – one who values a luxury hotel experience in central city locations, but at an affordable price. To meet these needs CanteenM is evolving, we translate F&B thoughts in a concept approach  and roll-out (17) CanteenM in the world's best cities.

projects.title: de Efteling, Backerei Krumel F&B concept development
projects.description: Bäckerei Krümel is an immersive bakery experience and completes the new Max & Moritz area at the Efteling. Together with the creative and culinary team of the Efteling, we started the development of an authentic bakery. The assortment has been developed exclusively for this location and elaborated in cooperation with local bakers. In the nostalgic double-deck oven, the most delicious pastries, plate bread and bread pizzas are baked for the guests throughout the day. Bäckerei Krümel can serve 125 people inside and 50 outside on the square.

contributors.headline: Food & Beverage concept strategist | Partner Conceptional | Creative Director | Support Fuku Ramen

projects.title: Rotterdam Ahoy, food court redevelopment
projects.description: Rotterdam Ahoy, food court redevelopment inside the playground of one of the biggest Event and Convention Centre (Its doors will open to visitors at the end of 2020) in The Netherlands. The redevelopment is part of the expansion consists of a unique space that can be used as an auditorium and as a concert hall. The food court is located in the heart of the Event Centre and targeted to re-open in 2020.

projects.title: Holland Casino, Food & Beverage concept development
projects.description:
Holland Casino has 14 venues throughout the Netherlands, it is all about an all-inclusive night out with friends or colleagues, gaming, wining, dining and entertainment. Food & Beverage concept development for a new immersive food experience for the rebuild of Holland Casino Utrecht and Venlo.  

- Holland Casino restaurant rebuild Utrecht targeted to open in 2019
- Holland Casino restaurant rebuild Venlo targeted to open in 2019

projects.title: Multi Corporation, Food & Beverage placemaking and feasibility study
projects.description:
St. Enoch Shopping Mall Glasgow, Scotland - F&B placemaking and feasibility study:
Second opinion of food court St. Enoch Shopping Mall and overlooking overall Food & Beverage activities (20 restaurants), feasibility study within St. Enoch Shopping Mall.

Blanchardstown Centre Dublin, Ireland - F&B placemaking and strategic review:
Strategic review of Food & Beverage activities (25 restaurants) of Blanchardstown Centre and mapping a comprehensive Food & Beverage strategy and vision for Blanchardstown Centre.

contributors.headline: Food & Beverage concept strategist | Partner Conceptional | Creative Director | Support Fuku Ramen

projects.title: IKEA food, Food & Beverage concept development
projects.description:
IKEA is a Swedish founded multinational group with over 400 stores, IKEA has restaurants are all over the world and the taste is cross-cultural. Every store includes a restaurant serving traditional Swedish food and a Swedish food market. 

IKEA is continue improving their F&B offer developed by Space10 the research and innovation lab led by IKEA. The restaurants of IKEA need to be place for food inspiration, a genuine feast for the senses, a total food experience. IKEA Amsterdam restaurant rebuild, targeted to open in 2019.

projects.title: de Efteling, Restaurant Fabula F&B concept development
projects.description: A true metamorphoses has taken place on the Pardoes Promenade at de Efteling, as the Pandadroom has transformed into Fabula. Fabula is the new 4D adventure of de Efteling, a movie during which a combination 4D effects like water, smell and wind surprise and excite visitors. The exit of the new attraction leads directly into the revamped playing area and the new Fabula restaurant. Conceptional worked closely together the de Efteling team to design this new restaurant and coffee bar.

projects.title: Steen & Strøm Norge and Klepierre, Oslo Økern Sentrum, Food & Beverage placemaking
projects.description: A new Nordic approach to shopping. Steen & Strøm seeks to create an urban, future-oriented city center in the most populous region of Oslo. From fashion and lifestyle to Food & Beverage and interiors, an expression of purity, freshness and simplicity is created. It is a totally innovative urban development in which the area of Økern will be transformed into a community driven Sentrum; a place to be all year round in greater Oslo. Set to open in 2022.

projects.title: HMSHost, Restaurant Grand Café Plaza Schiphol
projects.description:
The restaurant is located at Schiphol Plaza which is the shopping and dining area at the airport, accessible for everyone who is travelling from and to the airport. We developed in close co-operation with HMSHost, Schiphol and Heineken the new restaurant plan. 

The fully renovated restaurant is a one of a kind location where travellers see their loved ones after a long flight. The emotion of coming home is the inspiration for developing the restaurant plan and menu offer. What is more wonderful than catching up with your loved ones while enjoying a nice cup of coffee or a crispy burger? Comfort food! Grand Café Plaza is an all-day restaurant concept with bar, open 24 hours for everyone.

projects.title: CBRE Global Investors, Amsterdamse Poort Amsterdam - Food & Beverage Placemaking
projects.description: Amsterdamse Poort is located in Amsterdam Zuidoost, this upcoming area is transforming rapidly into an urban hub and connects the city with the urban area via the life line of Amsterdam. F&B strategy and vision to explore food and culture within this area. Targeted to transform in 2030.

F&B strategy and concept plan to continue to execute a clearly defined sqm concept and brand plan. Targeted to open in 2017 Phase 1 and in 2018 Phase 2.

projects.title: Hampshire hotels, Cafe Americain, F&B concept development
projects.description:
Class & Classics at Cafe Americain. The hotel and restaurant are in full swing, but the restaurant needs renewal. Hampshire Amsterdam American approached Conceptional for revitalising the concept of Café Americain. 

The new restaurant concept is about ‘Class & Classics’, in both design and menu. The menu will be developed by star-chef Peter Gast. The restaurant serves the best steak tartar prepared at the table and guests will be surprised by the cake trolley. The classic dishes are presented with a ‘golden border’. From breakfast till late night drink, Café American is open all-day. The new restaurant concept will open in December 2017.

projects.title: de Efteling, Vers & Verantwoord, F&B concept strategy and development
projects.description: De Efteling has asked Conceptional to critically reflect on the health proposition within the theme park. De Efteling wants to stimulate tasty and healthy food and seduce people to eat fresh & responsible (Vers & Verantwoord). The developed concept module can be implemented in the existing restaurants. Concepts where Conceptional has worked with: Panorama restaurant, De Verse Oogst, De Gelaarde Kat, De Gulde Gaarde and Het Witte Paard.

projects.title: Jacobs Douwe Egberts - The Blend, F&B concept development
projects.description: Jacobs Douwe Egberts (JDE) is a global coffee & tea company, serving consumers in more than 100 countries through iconic brands. Conceptional is asked to join the team to develop a coffee & tea concept focussing on the education market, with an elaboration in three formats. The new strategy of JDE for the education market is translated by Conceptional into a new coffee- and tea concept called The Blend. The Blend is a modular concept, and can be customized to any location. The Blend stands for new experiences, fun, interactive, education but also relaxation.

projects.title: Jaarbeurs Utrecht, Speys eten & drinken, food court
projects.description:
Speys eten & drinken is a sense of place with vibrant colours of five food stations, open faced kitchens and their canopies. Inside cinema Kinepolis and connected to the historic Jaarbeurs stage, the hustle and bustle of events and exhibitions leads people to the new food court for a warm welcome and food concepts to wander. 

- HOP de bar
- RUND de grill
- BASILICUM de oven
- OLIE & AZIJN de keuken
- KOFFIE & GRAAN de bakkerij

Manager Formula & Concept Development at Join Program

projects.title: Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, Lounge 2, F&B concept development
projects.description:
The newly renovated departures Lounge 2, Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, 12 million passengers will pass through Lounge 2 annually, transferring from EU to Int. flights, so their dwell time in the lounge could reach as much as eight hours between flights. The goal was to break away from the standard airport restaurants & bars, offering a unique experience that caters to the airports diverse traveller profiles; different food concepts were created to offer variety and next- level hospitality for travellers of any age. 

- Amsterdam Bread Company io Creneau Int. (2016)
- Cafe Coco io Studio Linse (2016)
- Heineken bar io Heineken (2016)
- Street Food Market io UXUS (2016)
- Frames bar & bites io Tjep (2016)

volunteer_experiences.description: A challenge from Amsterdam to Dakar (http://www.amsterdamdakar.nl/), unsupported rally of almost 7000 kilometers to support http://www.stichtinghandtohand.nl/.
The Youth Food Movement is a motion that actively stands for a more fair and healthier food system. We serve food for change.
Into the wild, it's all about manhood, the power to stand up for yourself and make important decisions in life, work and the relationships that matter the most.
